A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left this moving feeling amped. Wasn't Empire Strikes Back\, but was parsects away from the Phantom Menace. Then I heard that there was backlash and I couldn't figure out why.  The world has changed since the original trilogy. Star Wars has changed too. Change isn't always bad. Maybe people (or bots) hated the social commentary? I'd recommend those that hated it see it again. Let go of your hate; it's a good movie.
